amma baninne paya daha atak kompayutar raja issaraha innawa kiyala..
api denna oona suddanta echchara lesiyen hoyaganna bari deyak" kiyala.

“ayi obathumata eershyada?
mese balana wita bauddha aramudalak arambaimath, ema aramudalata aadhara kirimatath itha awashya karunakwa pawathi.
ee gunaya meketh noaduwama thiyenawa.
api iskole uganwana kale nanayakkara kiyala aandapala lamayek hitiya .
shakaya awahira nowanne nam pamanak nawatha nawatha karanna.
api janathawagen illa sitinawa, sihina pasupasa hambaa yanawa wenuwata ayithin wenuwen satan wadinna.
bauddha potha pathe sadahan wana paridi dagab bada kotasa hewath garbhaye hadaya anuwa dagab hayakata wen kota dakwa atha.
puda dena dane horen budina kota …….
"eewata ganna upakarana tikath eyagenma ahala danaganna.
paw ban malaya...
sama kenekutama honda ammek ho honda thaththek wiya nohaka.
kada watunu …

salaka balannam kiyala mata prathicharayak dakwuwa.
kalpana karala thiranayak gaththoth ee thiranayemayi inne.
meyayi sathyawu ekama dahama yanuwen awabodha karagaththemi.
kalabala wu ostin satan wirama nirikshana kamituwa haraha kotinta paniwudaya yawwe ya.
me, thaththamma kiyala , thaththage ammata kiyana ayath innawane.
mama hitiye methan sita kilomitar thunak aatha thanaka.
rohana saha daruwan sathiyakata anubhawa kale ek biththarayak bawini.
me sandaha anugamanaya kala yuthu nisi kramawedayan ellawala gowipala haraha hadunwa di atha.
“aa ehemada ehenam ubata palu athi”
mama methana inna boho aya ekka baluwahama alpashrathayek...
atama men tharu damiya hakiya......

nidahas nagarika bhumin saha welandapala upakarana matha wu asthanagatha kshathiya loka bankuwa idam welandapala simawan dakinne nagarika sanwardhanayata badhawak lesaya’ bhugoliya aarthikaya prathinirmanaya kirime awashyathawaya sandahan karamin loka bankuwa tharka karanne sima panawana lada badu kuli prathipaththinda athulath wu idam sanwardhana aagnyapanatha (1935) wisin wiwidha aramunu wenuwen rajyayata ayath idam wikinima walakwima magin karanne welandapala wiwidhathwayata hani karana bawaya.

ohu dadi kampanayakin pasu wu bawa pahadiliwama penennata thibuni.

namuth mama hithanne miniha mita wada piliwelata wada karanna purudu wenna oona .
